summary: SummaryMEDIHEAL Retinol Collagen Lifting Pad lifts and renews lackluster, sagging skin and improves the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Powerhouse age-defiers Retinol and Collagen create a wrinkle-filling effect, giving you firmer, smoother looking skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsInstantly firms the sagging under-eye and cheek areasExperience an immediate 109.64% improvement in firmness around the eye area and a 106.82% improvement in firmness around the cheek area after useInstantly helps to fill deep smile lines and under-eye wrinklesAchieve an immediate 126.95% improvement in firmness for smile lines and a 124.40% improvement in firmness for under-eye wrinkles after useFeaturesMade with Micro-net Stretch PadSized (2.6") to cover a wide areaRounded corners for a perfect fit on skinKey IngredientsFormulated with MEDIHEAL's proprietary CalmingTox complex and liposome delivery system for optimal results99% Pure Retinol and 300 Dalton Low-Molecular Collagen work together to fill wrinkles, providing a lifting care for enhanced firmnessItem 2626997How To UseApply the pad along the concerned area as a sheet mask, gently pat the remaining essence for absorption.For intensive care: Apply the pad to the targeted area for increased firmness. While holding the end of the pad, stretch it out in the direction you want the lifting care, then attach it.For firming care: By gently wiping with two pads attached to each cheek, a firmer and smoother skin texture can be achieved.IngredientsWater, Dipropylene Glycol, Glycereth-26, Betaine, 1,2-Hexanediol, Glycerin, Diphenyl Dimethicone, Hydroxyacetophenone, Triethylhexanoin, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Allantoin, Octyldodeceth-16, Polyglyceryl-10 Oleate, Sphingomonas Ferment Extract, Adenosine, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Polyacrylate, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Phytosterols, Anthemis Nobilis Flower Oil, Retinol, Beta-Glucan, Ceramide NP.
how_to_use: Apply the pad along the concerned area as a sheet mask, gently pat the remaining essence for absorption.For intensive care: Apply the pad to the targeted area for increased firmness. While holding the end of the pad, stretch it out in the direction you want the lifting care, then attach it.For firming care: By gently wiping with two pads attached to each cheek, a firmer and smoother skin texture can be achieved.

reviews.headline: Works, kinda
reviews.comments: I know retinol can cause purging, which I was expecting, but I almost gave up on this product because it was making me break out and I was about 75% into the product and felt like it shouldnt have taken almost the whole case for me to starr seeing a difference. I only stuck it out because I didn't wanna waste the product and I still had hope because I always hear good things about retinol‚Ä¶ I'm glad I didnr throw it away. I finally started to see skin improvments ~80% into the product. If you want something that will work fast, don't bother

reviews.headline: Loveeee
reviews.comments: This is my 4th time purchasing & i absolutely will continue fo buy. For the price can't beat that! This product will leave your face, feeling nice, hydrated and firm.

reviews.headline: Great product
reviews.comments: I bought this because it was a good price. I love it! My face looks so much better the morning after I use it. I will definitely repurchase.

reviews.headline: I'm going  to purchase this again
reviews.comments: ive tried different toners but this is the best thus far

reviews.headline: Sad
reviews.comments: This was my bad for not realizing only 9 ppl had reviewed this product and it suspiciously doesnt have pics of the actual product.  They are essentially just gauze pads‚Ä¶ they dont really stretch.  They arent shaped to fit any specific area and they dont stay on if you move.  The directions have no specified time so you have no idea how long to leave it on and honestly any product that has actual active ingredients is gunna tell you to patch test and remove the product after a certain amount of time.  This product does neither.  I was thinking this might be like a stretchy gauze stip kinda like some of the neck masks out there.  I have only used a few times but I have seen any results.  These are just expensive wet pads imo‚Ä¶

reviews.headline: A new lifelong staple
reviews.comments:
I'm in my late 20s and have been trying more products to slow aging recently. Every retinol product I've tried so far has irritated my skin. But this has not and I use quite frequently! After 1 month consistent usage I can say I have noticed a difference in my fine lines! 
I cannot wait to try more products from this brand!

reviews.headline: Makes my skin glowy
reviews.comments: This product has really heen naking my skin glow i just look good. Been getting compliments that my skin looks great and i always auffered with acne

reviews.headline: Second purchase
reviews.comments: I use a total of four Mediheal pads. I love them. They stay moist throughout. My face feels so clean since I started using them. I use this one nightly.  You can also use them as a mask by applying multiple pads to your face.

reviews.headline: This gave me a nice peel
reviews.comments: I am a prescription tret user, and even I was impressed with the results from this product, especially for the price!

reviews.headline: A new staple
reviews.comments: These pads smell incredible and the packaging is great. I enjoy using them and will be purchasing again. I use them daily but rotate night / day throughout the week. I recommend using these as an introduction to solidying a skincare routine.

reviews.headline: Love at first use
reviews.comments: I bought this and have used it twice so far. It makes my skin so incredibly soft! Im in my 40's and have dry/dehydrated skin. I use this at night and after i top with a face oil. Thats it! The face oul i use is the Biossance squalane+ vitamine c rose firmjng face oil. Will be purchasing more of the Mediheal pads!

reviews.headline: First time trying this
reviews.comments: Ourchased two days ago and used it two times at night. My forhead area felt smoother. Will buy again! I just wish they sold refills

reviews.headline: Love so far!
reviews.comments: Instantly noticed a difference after one use!

reviews.headline: So much new KBeauty ‚ù§Ô∏è
reviews.comments: I have ordered these pads from many other retailers. Love mediheal brand, these pads can be used as a toner and mask. I love the multipurpose functionality of the product, highly recommend. I am so excited to see so many new k beauty brands being sold on Ulta.

faceoff_positive.comments: I know retinol can cause purging, which I was expecting, but I almost gave up on this product because it was making me break out and I was about 75% into the product and felt like it shouldnt have taken almost the whole case for me to starr seeing a difference. I only stuck it out because I didn't wanna waste the product and I still had hope because I always hear good things about retinol‚Ä¶ I'm glad I didnr throw it away. I finally started to see skin improvments ~80% into the product. If you want something that will work fast, don't bother

faceoff_negative.comments: This was my bad for not realizing only 9 ppl had reviewed this product and it suspiciously doesnt have pics of the actual product.  They are essentially just gauze pads‚Ä¶ they dont really stretch.  They arent shaped to fit any specific area and they dont stay on if you move.  The directions have no specified time so you have no idea how long to leave it on and honestly any product that has actual active ingredients is gunna tell you to patch test and remove the product after a certain amount of time.  This product does neither.  I was thinking this might be like a stretchy gauze stip kinda like some of the neck masks out there.  I have only used a few times but I have seen any results.
